text: The 2019 Arizona Wildcats baseball team represented the University of Arizona in the 2019 NCAA Division I baseball season. The Wildcats played their home games for the 8th season at Hi Corbett Field. The team was coached by Jay Johnson in his 4th season at Arizona. == Personnel == === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="border-collapse:collapse; font-size:90%;" |- ! colspan=9 style=""|2019
